short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set websites to night mode. Darken bright backgrounds while keeping text visible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a lightweight and simple night mode add-on which creates a button on the toolbar which toggles night mode on/off on any website.

What is night mode? A dark colored UI which is easier for eyes for many people, especially when viewed in dark. This add-on modifies website's HTML elements background color and font color.

The color scheme works on most websites. Some images and elements might not render properly when this add-on is toggled on, depending on the website design.
